Classes in ch.ethz.twimight used by ch.ethz.twimight
BluetoothComms
          This class does all the work for setting up and managing Bluetooth connections with other devices.
BluetoothComms.AcceptThread
          This thread runs while listening for incoming connections.
BluetoothComms.ConnectedThread
          This thread runs during a connection with a remote device.
BluetoothComms.ConnectThread
          This thread runs while attempting to make an outgoing connection with a device.
ConnectionHelper
          Provides functionality to login with Twitter
